reviews.title: Hate these wipes. They always tear apart
reviews.name: dana
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
reviews.review: NOT A FAN!!!! They are so thin. They tear coming out of the package. You can just take one. I have wasted so many wipes because they just don't pull apart easily. THEY RIPE!!!! For sensitive skin. No skin irritation. Not soft on the butt. I wish I could give no stars for the durability of these wipes. I have such hatred for the ripping of these wipes. The only thing I like is the packaging. Perfect for the diaper bag. The top closes. Never a dry wipe. If you can get past tearing wipes each time, than it's a good wipe. For me, I will not be buying anymore. Not good for a rush changing or poop diaper. We like to change NASCAR fast. Not the wipe for us.

reviews.title: Raw rash
reviews.name: Vanessa Ybarra
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.review: If I could give 0 stars I would. I always order pampers sensitive water wipes but I decided to go with this one for the sake of saving and my babies have raw rashes so bad!! I will not be buying again. Be aware! It's horrible. I would post pics but not appropriate. I threw away everything. They would bubble when wiping like they are filled with some kind of soap. I never had this problem with any other wipes.

reviews.title: Box full of bugs
reviews.name: shellbell
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2024
reviews.review: Have received this or a few months. This month's order was full of tiny little hopping bugs. Every individual package was loaded and the bottom of the box was full too. I didn't notice until I brought the box into my house and then got those little critters in my house. Will never order again.

reviews.title: Product is good but delivery was awful
reviews.name: lmchill
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2024
reviews.review: Why did the driver leave my pkg on steps and not at my front door since it was raining?? Box got all wet and if it was put in front of door, would have been dry. Good thing Huggies wipes are in plastic bags

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.name: Norine Ghi
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024
reviews.review: This product is a small wipe, semi dry, right out of the container. Do not recommend for self-cleaning. If water added could be a useful for travel wipes, or some Anti-Bacterial liquid could be useful.

reviews.title: HOLY.. and not in the good way.
reviews.name: Robin713
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.review:
These wipes tore repeatedly as I tried to take them out of the package, as I separated them, and during the worst time... When wiping a baby bum with smelly #2. I was so disappointed by this "top brand". Kirkland wipes are thin but durable, pampers are thicker but stretch, and I was hoping these would be a good in between for my finances. The top wipes are still from Melaleuca - they are larger, slightly stretchy but not too much, and I have NEVER. had. a tear.
DO NOT BUY.

reviews.title: Not the same Huggies
reviews.name: Les Raymond
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.review: This bears the Huggy's name brand, but I don't know where they are made but they are definitely not the same quality as the Huggies you can buy in the grocery store. They are very stiff like you are using paper. Yes they are thick like the true Huggies brand but not soft and pliable. It is very difficult to use them in the crease of baby's skin because they are so stiff. Will never buy these again and I always use nothing but Huggies. I am adding this later. I did find out they are true Huggies but they are Huggies cheapest brand or type of huggies. I would not recommend them to anyone. Avoid the ones that say Simply Clean

reviews.title: Small, flimsy, potential allergy issue
reviews.name: DreaDeru
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.review: We got the box, and at first our only issue was the wipes were small and super-easy to rip (we ripped the first few just taking them out of a bag). After a few uses though, we found that our son developed a horrid rash in response to them. Checking the ingredients, almost every potential allergen that baby wipes can contain (save alcohol) is in these. Whole box is now useless.

reviews.title: Will never buy anything Huggies now bc of these
reviews.name: Chelsey
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.review: These are the worst diaper wipes I have ever used. They are very dry. If you have a wipe dispenser of any sort these will not work. They are perforated and rip so they will not continue to come out. They rip off and then you have to opener your dispenser every time to get one out. Not folded within themselves to continously come out. Again very dry and small.

reviews.title: Dried out
reviews.name: Jill Podraza
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2025
reviews.review: These were all dried out

reviews.title: Worst wipes out there
reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024
reviews.review: Honestly, these are awful! Not sure how there are so many great reviews here... they rip incredibly easily, are super small, bunch up too much to clean well, and the residue even comes off on my baby's skin! Wish I had never purchased in the first place.

reviews.title: Don’t Recommend
reviews.name: QUEEN29
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024
reviews.review: As a mom I do not recommend purchasing this specific brand. This product is extremely dry , it defeats the purpose of cleaning your baby. Please don’t get your money , you get what you pay for —-

reviews.title: The full amount missing
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2025
reviews.review:
This is a modal window.

No compatible source was found for this media.
I opened the box and there was a whole pack of wipes missing

reviews.title: Ready for a workout?!
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2021
reviews.review: Child poos. Ok. Open diaper, crap everywhere. Open easy open wipes...go to pull one out and bam it rips trying to grab the wipe out bc you can't get a hold of it. It's apparently stuck to the one underneath. Meanwhile my child is being a gymnast trying to get away from me. I'm screaming to stay still, crap is about to get everywhere all bc I can't get a damn wipe out of the package thingy. Desperate I hand my child the nearest object and then pinch down hard into the wipes and grab what looks to be about 15 wipes (I cant tell bc they are stuck together) to wipe my childs ass.......Needless to say we will never be buying these again....

reviews.title: Not if you actually change babies
reviews.name: R Burg
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.review: These are just so irritating. They will NOT peel apart easily. They shred unless you take a large bundle out and pull them apart one at a time. They will not pop out of the top easily. They are the opposite of a one handed endeavor which is enraging when you are trying to keep a fourteen month old from grabbing themselves and rolling in their own poop. They also create a strange amount of suds. I can hand my three year old one to clean her hands and she will have two hands covered in white bubbles, which makes me question what I’m changing my baby with anyway. It’s a no for these. I much prefer the Amazon prime brand to these.

reviews.title: Painful, like wiping with sandpaper
reviews.name: Mom
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.review: These wipes are gritty and rough. They’re also a lot thinner than they have been in the past. I got a box of these last month on subscribe and save, and they were perfectly comfortable. But this box, I can’t even wipe my face with, let alone my baby’s bottom. We stopped buying Huggies wipes years ago due to this this problem. I had thought they’d resolved it, but we prefer this type of wipe (more like a paper towel than a washcloth) to pampers. clearly there’s a serious quality control issue.

reviews.title: "New Look" means new formula. No good. Unsanitary.
reviews.name: Cali
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.review: "New Look" really means new formula and bad quality. These "Simply Clean' unscented wipes are a dupe of discontinued "One and Done" unscented wipes which were perfect. Purchased the previous version before the "New Look" for 5+ years which were top tier all purpose wipes. These "New Look Simply Clean" wipes smell like animal urine and mold. The wipes are super thin and are not smooth at all, leaving residue worse than toilet tissue. I immediately disposed of the entire "New Look" package as the wipes were unsanitary. I would not recommend any human use these wipes on sensitive or private areas, especially children, unless you want serious health issues. Insane. Disgusted.

reviews.title: Product changed- they are rough
reviews.name: Lisa S.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.review: I have used Huggies wipes on both of my kids- first born in 2017 and my second in 2021. I bought 2 cases at the end of June with the new tops and design. They had to have changed the actual product because they are awful! My daughter got the worst rash (beginning of July until end of August) which was treated with 3 different medications and it wasn't until I stopped using these wipes that it cleared up!!! I never would have thought it was a problem with the wipes because I had always used them- but our doctor suggested switching brands. I'll never use these again 😩

reviews.title: Received different box than photo shows online - these are not flushable in photo
reviews.name: Dee Gerbs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.review: These huggies have clogged my plumbing line. They are advertised as plant based, but that language fooled me as I thought plant based should be able to be dissolved. It appears that the photo on the listing is not the box I received. The boxes of Huggies I received does say do not flush, but I really didn't look at the box. My fault I guess. Amazon should be shipping the box that shows the photo that does not say these are not flushable.

reviews.title: Scam?
reviews.name: Ashley Eilbes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.review: Something doesn’t seem right with the wipes I received. The glue on the tops was sticky and pulling open, which was my first clue something was wrong. We buy huggies because they pull apart better than other brands so it is easier to do 1 handed, these I couldn’t get apart to save my life. Huggies wipes have an H on them and the wipes that were in my huggies containers had bears. Maybe they changed the image and it’s just poor packaging or we’re the wipe containers refilled with a different brand? I’m not sure but will be buying my wipes from somewhere else from now on.

reviews.title: Sandpaper
reviews.name: Irfaan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2020
reviews.review:
I ordered a handful of these out of desperation because nearly everything else was sold out. Well, now I know why these terrible things were available. :(

Dry as sand, and about as gentle. And they tear apart about as easily as a paper napkin - the only pleasure my baby got out of these was (easily!) tearing up any sheet he grabbed into confetti. He certainly didn't get a good cleaning; the poor little thing has ended up with multiple diaper rashes.

As soon as I got my hand on another brand, I tossed my entire supply of these out; I'd rather run out of wipes than inflict these on my baby again.

reviews.title: FIBERGLASS SAND TEXTURE ON WIPES! Be careful!
reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.review:
My baby developed a TERRIBLE diaper rash and open wound. Didn’t realize that these wipes were the problems until I used one on my face. There’s this shiny grainy texture that is on all of the wipes!!! And unfortunately I ended up getting 3 boxes. Googled it and in 2012 there was a similar problem and Huggies stated it was an issue during manufacturing.

DON’T USE AND MAKE SURE YOU CHECK IF YOU DO!

reviews.title: Opened and missing
reviews.name: Tisha
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2024
reviews.review: The box was opened and a pack of wipes was missing.

reviews.title: DO NOT GET!
reviews.name: rebecca
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.review: Horrible wipe, I didn't think you could mess up wet wipes but I was wrong, they fall apart when trying to get out of the bag , even when I try to be extremely careful they tear apart. Not worth it. I bought 4 boxes and so badly want to return them and get my money back but they will only refund me for one box. I about to just give them away to someone for free cause they suck that much (i doubt anyone would even want them). Its rare a product sucks that much that I leave a bad review like this.

reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
reviews.name: JS
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
reviews.review:
Absolute garbage. Seriously, don't waste your money. It is a challenge removing a wipe from the packaging without it ripping. Let alone using the wipe for anything else.

I normally order the Amazon brand but it was not available. I figured a wipe is a wipe and made the mistake of purchasing this garbage. I figure the Amazon product is probably a solid C. If that is the case this product is an F. An very low on that scale.

I have not purchased many brands of wipes but am challenged to think of a lower quality product.

reviews.title: Tear
reviews.name: Alvina Aguilar
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
reviews.review:
Now I know why they are cheaper
They tear when you pull them out every time

reviews.title: Missing a pack of baby Wipe
reviews.name: Abidemi Gaines
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.review: Item arrived at my front door , i noticed the box was already open with one pack of baby wipe missing .

reviews.title: Most annoying wipes ever!!!
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.review: Decided to buy these instead of my usual Huggies Natural Care wipes. The biggest problem is that they are very difficult to take out of the package wipe by wipe. They seem very tightly packed which makes it as if they are adhered to each other. Constantly using my nail and pinched fingers to grab a wipe—definitely not convenient when diaper changing a toddler! Aside from that annoying feature, the wipe by itself sucks!! It’s stiff, moderately moist, and they tear apart when being used!!! Imagine my frustration when I used them for the first time on a very poopy diaper!

reviews.title: Me llegó destapada y con menos
reviews.name: Nicol cruz
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2024
reviews.review: No me gustó le faltaban

reviews.title: Best product
reviews.name: Judi warren
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
reviews.review: Quality durable. Best value than in stores

reviews.title: Wet sand paper.
reviews.name: Kai Sin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2021
reviews.review: They're rough like those old wool blankets that were washed too many times with the lint balls that never come off. There's no way to tell which way to pull from but if you pull from the middle you could rip through 3 before being able to pull them out. I put them in as a refills for my wipe container and they don't pull each other up like they should and require vigorous shaking to separate them. Not ideal for impatient babies. These wipes don't even handle the simplest of tasks regular wipes do. Never again.

reviews.title: Gave my son butt rash
reviews.name: Karolina B.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
reviews.review: I went from sensitive wipes to these and they gave my son a butt rash. I guess he’s a sensitive guy, but that says a lot about these wipes.

reviews.title: Not the greatest
reviews.name: marta
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.review: I ordered these based on the tens of thousands positive reviews and my expectations were high. Unfortunately, I was extremely disappointed. The wipes aren’t soft at all. They’re stiff and tear easily. I cannot use them in the wipe warmer because they rip every time I try to take one out. I cancelled my subscription and going back to Costco’s Kirkland unscented wipes. They are far superior.

reviews.title: These wipes suck.
reviews.name: Cassandra
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.review: I used to used target brand up&Up wipes but these were on sale so I gave them a shot. I don’t even care that they come out attached to each other but the fact that if one of them isn’t popped up out of the container and I go to pull it out and end up ripping little pieces off the wipe instead just speaks to the quality of these wipes. They are thin, tear apart easily, and frankly for one of the top name brands I think they are absolute crap. Will definitely never buy these again.

reviews.title: Dry and Rough
reviews.name: MadCool
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.review: These baby wipes are one of the worst ones out of all the brands that we have tried. It is barely wet and is very rough compared to other brands. Worst is that after wiping, you see little residue pieces left on the area where we used the wipe. Our baby was not happy with how rough it felt. Every pack in the box was the same.

reviews.title: Returned - wipes are breaking
reviews.name: Tracy K
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
reviews.review: We normally use Pampers wipes. It’s getting harder to buy wipes with a resealable lid. So I tried these. As I was using them- they were breaking apart. Not good.

reviews.title: Package arrived open
reviews.name: Patrick Kennedy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2024
reviews.review: Cardboard case arrived on my porch opened. Package of wipes were missing.

reviews.title: Very dry and rough, almost like paper
reviews.name: Ashley M Stiffy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024
reviews.review: I typically purchase Huggies products but in my opinion would not recommend purchasing this particular brand. The wipe itself is rather dry and rough, they don’t seem to hold must moisture. If you want to wipe your babies bottom with paper, go right ahead and buy the simply clean ones.

reviews.title: I wouldn’t wipe my own butt with these….
reviews.name: LG & ZG
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.review: These wipes are awful—not at all worth the savings. In an attempt to take one wipe out at a time, you will inevitably either end up tearing it and pulling half of a single wipe out (useless), or you will end up pulling 3-4 baby wipes out all at once (wasteful). Truly frustrating when you’re often doing this one-handed while holding down a baby with the other. Needless to say, I’ll be paying the extra couple of dollars and going back to Pampers.

reviews.title: Nope will not be purchasing this again
reviews.name: Blessed One
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.review: I’ve been using baby wipes for years for myself, so when I got these, I did not like the feel of it they was too rough, but I’m going to use them, but I will not be getting this product again. I’m used to a much softer wipe.

reviews.title: Very rough.
reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
reviews.review:
This product is supposed to be for sensitive skin and when I say we don't even need sensitive products, I mean it. We usually use Walmart brand wipes which aren't the best but are still softer and more sensitive than these.

These are extremely rough and caused a full bottom rash on my 2 year old. We got them because they were on sale but never again. They won't even let us have a refund for these awful excuses for sensitive wipes.

Beware.

reviews.title: Terrible wipes
reviews.name: Sean Bigley
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2024
reviews.review: These are the worst wipes on the market by far. It takes at least 7-10 wipes if god forbid my child poops. Will never buy again, and I’m cursing myself for having wasted money on a whole box.

reviews.title: These wipes fall apart in your hands.
reviews.name: Kate & Phil
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.review: I have 3 children and have never used Huggies wipes, we stick with Target store brand. We happened to be running out of wipes and it made the most logistical sense to buy these from Amazon due to availability. I only opened one pack of these wipes and they start to fall apart when you pull them out of the packaging. We gave the rest of the pack to my sons daycare and took the trip to target for the store brand wipes. Don't buy these

reviews.title: Didn’t work for my baby’s sensitive skin
reviews.name: Amazon customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
reviews.review: Worst wipes ever, my baby has dry skin and left red rashes on my baby’s skin. I wouldn’t recommend this product at all.

reviews.title: Terrible quality
reviews.name: customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024
reviews.review: Don’t waste your money on these cheap, low quality wipes. They’re rough on the skin and do an awful job of properly cleaning.

reviews.title: Unsatisfied with the box of wipes
reviews.name: Wouldn't order again due to packaging malfunction
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2024
reviews.review: Moat of the wipe packages were not packaged right or the top came right off the first use

reviews.title: Wipes leave residue
reviews.name: P.C. Battle II
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.review:
We thought it was one package but all packages seemed to leave flaky and lint-like residue when using with our baby. Also, the wipes are thinner than most and are a bit harder to pull apart when trying to change a diaper. Especially when the little one starts to get antsy during the process.

More often than not, we ended up pinching way too many wipes or tearing a hole in one trying to separate them at the fold.

Not horrible but not as good as pampers wipes either.

reviews.title: WHERE THE HUGGIES WIPES
reviews.name: Eddie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024
reviews.review: THIN WIPES FULL OF WETNESS AND CRAPPY TO ASSIST THE USER IN CLEANING UP. I DO NOT RECCOMMEND THESE WIPES. IM STUCK WITH THEM BECAUSE I THOUGHT GOOD VALUE FOR PRICE, BUT NOW I KNOW WHY.

reviews.title: Worst wipes/don't buy
reviews.name: sunny
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.review:
We bought a giant box of these wipes and can not use them! They are almost completely dry and my baby screams when I try to wipe him. They also tear as I try to pull them out of the warming wipes box I have.
We were using pampers which were amazingly soft and worked just fine in the warming wipes box, but switched to huggies because they saved us $4...
I would pay way more to have a product that works.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.name: M. Packard
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2021
reviews.review: These wipes are terrible. They rip apart when pulling out of package, they are very dry so you have to use more than normal for each diaper change, and you have to fish around looking for the end so you can get it out of the package. Easier said than done when you are already trying to wrestle a 12 month old (with a dirty bottom) and keep him from rolling off the changing table! Wish I could return them. The Amazon brand is much better than these.

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.name: Kaci
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.review: These are like wet paper towels. Rough on the skin, tear apart in your hands. The worst wipes I've ever used! I will never buy these again! My daughter didn't have a red bum until we used these. I am so mad that I bought these!! I honestly don't want to use these but I have a whole box of them!

reviews.title: It dispenses more than one wipe almost every time. I hate that.
reviews.name: Sandra Lux Carr
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2021
reviews.review: The things I like about these wipes are the fact that they are nice and thick, they remove grease on my face and I can freshen my groin, which absolutely doesn't work with scented wipes (ask your gynecologist, if you don't believe me). I'm going to have to move on, though, because they rarely dispense just one wipe. That's not only irritating, but it leaves me wondering if Huggies does that on purpose so one goes through a package of wipes faster. Do they think we're all stupid?!

reviews.title: Not the usual design and distasteful quality.
reviews.name: Unsatisfied Mom
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.review: I normally order these two items for my baby but when I receive them this time the quality and design of them both is absolutely different than what they normally are. The diaper on the right is what they usually look like and the wipes at the bottom is what they usually look like. The opposite ones are what I received today and the feeling of them is very rough and dry. I am definitely not please.
